definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Phase evolution was studied by the synchrotron radiation photoemission technique.
sentences.chinese: 用同步輻射光電子能譜研究了相衍變過程。

sentences.english: The opportunity and challenge faced by (China's) optoelectronics industry is also analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了我國光電子產業面臨的機遇和挑戰。

sentences.english: In order to produce photoelectrons, light is needed as the source of radiation.
sentences.chinese: 光電子的產生是需要有光作爲輻射源。

sentences.english: Besides, we use ultraviolet photoemission spectroscopy to measure the unoccupied states of the materials.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還使用光電子光譜學來研究其光電特性。

sentences.english: The forecast of dimmable electronic ballast is also presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了可調光電子鎮流器的前景預測。

sentences.english: Optoelectronics & information industry was founded quite early in Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 光電子學與消息產業建立相當早正在武漢。

sentences.english: JD- I applied advanced fibre-optic technology and optoelectronics for information processing.
sentences.chinese: 儀器採用先進的光導纖維和光電子信息處理技術。

sentences.english: So, let's start with talking about photoelectron spectroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，我們開始講光電子能譜。

sentences.english: Electronic Ballast for Fluorescent lamp in Theater Project.
sentences.chinese: 運用日光燈之可調光電子安定器於劇場計劃。

sentences.english: Many efforts have been made to develope silicon based optoelectronics.
sentences.chinese: 近來人們對發展硅基光電子學作出了很大的努力。

sentences.english: Using Dimmable Electronic Ballast for Fluorescent lamp in Theater Project.
sentences.chinese: 運用日光燈之可調光電子安定器於劇場計劃。

sentences.english: Si-based optoelectronics will be one of the main topics in the optoelectronics research area in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 硅基光電子學無疑是今後光電子學發展的方向。

sentences.english: Si-based optoelectronics will be one of the main topics in the optoelectronics research area in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 硅基光電子學無疑是今後光電子學發展的方向。

sentences.english: The development of optoelectronic integration needs Si-based light-emitting materials.
sentences.chinese: 發展光電子集成技術需要硅基發光材料。

sentences.english: These glasses may be widely used in the field of optoelectronics.
sentences.chinese: 它們可以被廣泛的應用於光電子領域。

sentences.english: Single Crystal, Substrate, Optico-Electronics, Film, Epitaxy.
sentences.chinese: 單晶，襯底，光電子，薄膜，外延。
